entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 30 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
